name: Retracing Bolide
flower_description: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?
feather_description: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.
sand_description: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.
goblet_description: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.
circlet_description: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.
four_pc_bonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.
